scripts.cleanall: rm -rf build/ target/; mkdir -p build target
scripts.compileglsl: glslmin src/shaders/logic.frag > build/logic.frag -s rand -s S_ -s NW -s NN -s NE -s WW -s CC -s EE -s SW -s SS -s SE -s main && glslmin src/shaders/render.frag > build/render.frag && glslmin src/shaders/logic.vert > build/logic.vert && glslmin src/shaders/render.vert > build/render.vert
scripts.tmpljs: cat src/pre.js src/jsfxr.js >> build/build.js; ./wrap.sh build/render.frag FRAGMENT_RENDER >> build/build.js && ./wrap.sh build/render.vert VERTEX_RENDER >> build/build.js && ./wrap.sh build/logic.frag FRAGMENT_LOGIC >> build/build.js && ./wrap.sh build/logic.vert VERTEX_LOGIC >> build/build.js; cat src/index.js >> build/build.js; cat src/post.js >> build/build.js
scripts.gen: cp assets/tiles.png target/t.png && cp src/target.html target/index.html && cp build/build.min.js target/b.js
scripts.build: npm run cleanall && npm run compileglsl && npm run tmpljs && npm run minify && npm run gen
scripts.build-nominify: npm run cleanall && npm run compileglsl && npm run tmpljs && npm run nominify && npm run gen
scripts.watch: npm run build; wr 'npm run build' src/ assets/
